text: The Hohhot Ring Expressway (), designated as G5901 is an expressway in Inner Mongolia, Northern China orbiting the city of Hohhot. This expressway is a branch of G6 Beijing–Lhasa Expressway. ==Detailed Itinerary== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" width="600px" ! text- align="center" colspan="3" | 15px Clockwise 15px |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" | colspan="4" | 15px Continues as 40px G5901 Hohhot Ring Expressway 15px |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" | 1 A-B || 30px 25px || 30px G6 Jingla Expressway 30px G7 Jingxin Expressway |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" | 2 || 25px || 30px G110 Road Bayan |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" align="center" | 9 || 25px || {| border=0 |- size=40 | bgcolor=#960 style="font-size: 10pt;
